name: Spirit Quest: Journey to Devil's Mound
name_original: Spirit Quest: Journey to Devil's Mound
description:
My entry for the 46th Ludum Dare.

This game is controlled entirely by the mouse and only uses the left mouse button.

The options in the main menu allow you to change the volume of both the sound effects and music.

There are in game instructions but if you are using a screen reader of some sort (or have a bad memory) I will post theme here for your ease of use.

Spirit Quest is a JRPGish game controlled entirely with the mouse. 

Each fight you have four options
   - Attack (Deal Damage)
   - Defend (Reduce Damage Taken)
   - Boost (Power up next attack or defence (this stacks))
   - Meditate (Heal 25% of your current health)

Your goal is to make it through all seven battles and save the world from destruction.

After each fight you will get a status boost and be healed fully.

Thank you for choosing to play Spirit Quest!
